summary: Completed testing of Mission Control Dashboard UI improvements including Agent Detail Modal, Live Feed toggle, Search modal, and backend API integration. Backend APIs working 100%, frontend UI elements mostly functional with minor interaction testing limitations.

testing_limitations.issue: Modal backdrop intercepts clicks on background elements during testing
testing_limitations.impact: Prevents comprehensive testing of feed toggle when modal is open
testing_limitations.note: This is a testing environment issue, not a user-facing bug

passed_tests: Backend GET /api/agents returns 10 agents with llmProvider/llmModel
Backend GET /api/agents/jarvis returns correct agent data
Agent rows clickable - opens Agent Detail Modal
Modal shows correct agent data (name, role, badge, status)
LLM provider/model fields display correctly (Anthropic/Claude Sonnet 4.5)
System instructions textarea shows multi-line content
Prompt templates section displays 3 templates with variables
Search modal opens with Cmd+K shortcut
Search button in top bar opens search modal
Search functionality works (typing 'SEO' shows Vision agent)
Clicking search results opens agent detail modal
Task cards have correct 8px border radius (reduced from 10px)
Feed visibility persists on page refresh (localStorage)
Multiple agents clickable (Jarvis, Shuri, Fury, Vision)
